thumb.title: This is the first version of our trailer video □
thumb.description: This is the first version of our trailer video 🎉 We are still in the early stages of development, so your support and suggestions are very important to us 🙏Hey #gamedevs! It's #TrailerTuesday ! 💬Comment with your #indiegames here ❤️Like ✅ Follow 🔖Add to Steam wishlist!https://store.steampowered.com/app/3822530/Camp_Wombo/
